vtkshow.cpp File Reference

display renderwindow More...

Detailed Description

display renderwindow

config = vtkshow([VTKHANDLE] [, config, ...])

Parameters:
[in] HANDLE (optional) explicit VTK handle
[in] config (optional) config structure (see Configuration parameters)
[out] config a struct containing the camera settings
Configuration
cameraRoll default: 0, movement towards focal point.
cameraFocalDisk default: 1.0, size of focal disk
cameraViewAngle: view angle in degress, default: 30, influence on perspective distortion
cameraProjection projection mode: 'perspective' (default) or 'parallel'
cameraFocalPoint point at which the camera looks (from cameraPosition to cameraFocalPoint), default: [0 0 0]
cameraPosition position of the camera, default: [0 0 1]
cameraViewUp view up vector, defines rotation along view axis, default: [0 1 0]
the retuned config parameters can be used to restore an exact camera position/view of the scene.

Warning:
On Unix platforms do not close the X11 window by clicking the window close handle, or Matlab will crash.
